snippet: An instructor at the School of Visual Arts evaluates a design critique offered by the nominally retired former G.M. vice chairman, published this week on Forbes.com.
abstract: An instructor at the School of Visual Arts evaluates a design critique offered by the nominally retired former G.M. vice chairman, published this week on Forbes.com.

headline.main: Bob Lutz, Design Critic? Grading the Ex-G.M. Executive on His Latest Gig
